mapper.insert: INSERT INTO branch(branch_code,branch_name, branch_reg, branch_ceo, emp_num, branch_phone, branch_post, branch_add, branch_email) VALUES(CONCAT('BR', LPAD(#{branch_code}, 4, '0')),#{branch_name}, #{branch_reg},#{branch_ceo},#{emp_num},#{branch_phone},#{branch_post},#{branch_add},#{branch_email})
